item.title: Battlefield 6 Portal Codes: Best XP Farm Bot Lobbies Codes
item.content:encoded:
Battlefield 6 brings back the electric Portal mode from BF 2042. It’s new and improved, and those of you who are shrewd can take advantage of its intricate matchmaking settings. Use our best Battlefield 6 Portal codes as they offer a glorious gateway to farming lobbies filled with generous bots dying to give you XP and speed up the game’s grind.

When you give a passionate community a literary sandbox full of customizable tools and assets, what else are you going to get? We can tell you we weren’t even remotely surprised to see Star Wars ships gracing the game’s skies, but Call of Duty maps being remade with hours of launch was funny; we’ll give you that.

Another reason Battlefield 6’s Portal mode has proven popular is that it gets around the snail-like XP rates.

Best Battlefield 6 XP Farm Codes

From chaotic bot slaughters to tactically refined war zones, the Battlefield 6 servers are overflowing with creative community-made experiences. We’ve rounded up the best XP farm experience codes that will help you climb ranks and upgrade your arsenal in record time.

Here’s a complete table breaking down each server, what it offers, and why you should play it.

Are Battlefield 6 Portal XP Farms Being Nerfed?

Yes, Battlefield Studios will be adjusting Battlefield 6’s Portal mode to “Diminish the number of XP farms taking up server space while further emphasizing playing with friends on both custom and verified experiences.”

We can’t have nice things, can we? It depends on how you look at it, really. Battlerfield Portal probably wasn’t designed to be an XP grind; it was supposed to be a creative playground filled with fun-filled rides packed with madness. However, the community got smart and used Portal to level up player ranks, weapons, and more much quicker.

Depending on when you read this guide, the nerfs might have already happened. But we know for sure that Battlefield 6 Portal XP Farms will be patched.

item.title: Horizon Zero Dawn Movie Planned to Release in 2027, Court Documents Reveal
item.content:encoded:
The Horizon Zero Dawn movie aims to start shooting in 2026 and release in 2027.

For those unaware, Sony is fighting Tencent for allegedly copying its Horizon series in its upcoming title, Light of Motiram. Sony recently described the title as a blatant knock-off of their game. Now, new documents have revealed more information, including the release plans for the Horizon Zero Dawn Movie.

Horizon Zero Dawn Movie Has a Working Script and is Looking for a Director

According to a report by The Game Post, the head of PlayStation Productions, Asad Qizilbash, spoke about the release plans for the Horizon Zero Dawn movie in a sworn declaration. Qizilbash stated that a film based on the Horizon series is in development in partnership with Columbia Pictures, with whom they have already partnered on the Uncharted and Gran Turismo films in 2023 and 2023, respectively.

Qizilbash added that they “already have a working script and are actively searching for a director.” The team aims to start “shooting the picture in 2026 and releasing it in 2027.” In the declaration, the PlayStation Productions head also spoke about Aloy’s significance as a brand, not just to the Horizon franchise, but to Sony PlayStation itself. The declaration doesn’t mention anything about the upcoming movie’s cast or plot.

In other news, Tencent had responded to Sony’s copyright and trademark infringement lawsuit with a motion to dismiss. Additionally, Splash Damage, the studio behind Gears Tactics, has separated from Tencent with the help of private investors. What are your thoughts on the Horizon Zero Dawn movie release in 2027?
